r.s: SQL database XML definition tool for DDL creation and differencing
r.d:
Database DDL generation for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "DDL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
r.n:
Initial release of DBSteward package
Supported Database Platform DDL generation: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008
Stubbed Database Platform DDL generation: * mysql4 - MySQL 4 * oracle10g - Oracle 10g
Supported db structure dump into DBSteward XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8
